attributes.action: Accurate monitoring & recording of Bulgarian & Romanian citizens
attributes.additional_details: Access across the UK Border by economic migrants from the EU has not been effectively monitored and recorded by successive UK governments, leading to wholly inaccurate estimates of the numbers and social impact of arriving migrants in the UK.  From the 1st January 2013, the UK government must accurately monitor and record all Bulgarian & Romanian citizens accessing the UK Border and make this information easily, clearly and concisely available to members of the UK public.
